instructions.decode_desc: Convert Base64 format back to original text.
instructions.file_desc: You can upload files for Base64 encoding.

errors.encode_failed: Encoding failed: Input contains invalid characters
errors.decode_failed: Decoding failed: Input is not valid Base64 format

errors.invalid_url: This is not a complete URL

hash.title: Hash Calculator
hash.description: Calculate hash values using various algorithms

input.title: Input Content
input.description: Enter text content to calculate hash

instructions.title: Algorithm Description
instructions.md5_desc: 128-bit hash algorithm, fast but less secure, mainly used for data integrity verification.
instructions.sha1_desc: 160-bit hash algorithm, more secure than MD5 but still has collision risks.
instructions.sha256_desc: 256-bit hash algorithm, widely used secure hash algorithm.
instructions.sha512_desc: 512-bit hash algorithm, provides the highest level of security.
instructions.salt_desc: Add random string before hash calculation to improve security.

errors.empty_input: Please enter content to calculate hash

meta.title: Hash Calculator - MD5, SHA1, SHA256 Online Tool
meta.description: Calculate hash values using various algorithms including MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512. Support for salt and file uploads.
meta.keywords: hash calculator, md5, sha1, sha256, sha512, cryptography, password hashing

jwt.title: JWT Tools
jwt.description: JWT token decoding, validation and generation tools

decode.title: JWT Decoding
decode.description: Decode JWT token and validate its signature

generate.title: Generate JWT Token
generate.description: Generate JWT token using custom payload and secret

instructions.title: JWT Description
instructions.structure_desc: Consists of three parts: Header, Payload, and Signature.
instructions.header_desc: Contains token type and signature algorithm information.
instructions.payload_desc: Contains claim information such as user ID, permissions, expiration time, etc.
instructions.signature_desc: Used to verify the integrity and authenticity of the token.
instructions.common_fields_desc: sub (subject), iat (issued at), exp (expiration time), iss (issuer).

meta.title: JWT Tools - Decode and Validate JWT Tokens
meta.description: Decode JWT tokens, validate signatures, and generate new tokens. Support for various algorithms.
meta.keywords: jwt, json web token, token decoder, jwt validation, jwt generator

binary.title: Binary Converter

instructions.title: Conversion Instructions
instructions.text_to_hex_desc: Each character is converted to its ASCII/Unicode hexadecimal representation.
instructions.hex_to_text_desc: Hexadecimal values are converted back to their corresponding characters.
instructions.binary_desc: Each character is converted to its 8-bit binary representation.
instructions.format_desc: Hex values can be separated by spaces or colons for better readability.
instructions.use_cases_desc: Data analysis, debugging, low-level programming, network protocols.

meta.title: Hex Converter - Text to Hexadecimal Online Tool

meta.keywords: hex converter, text to hex, hexadecimal, binary converter, encoding tools

instructions.compression_desc: Remove all unnecessary whitespace to reduce file size.
instructions.syntax_desc: Keys must be strings, values can be strings, numbers, booleans, null, objects, or arrays.
instructions.use_cases_desc: API development, data exchange, configuration files, web applications.

instructions.advantages_desc: No external file dependencies, faster loading for small images.
instructions.disadvantages_desc: Larger file size, not suitable for large images.
